trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which the system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: 指定系統排列最小化視窗的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
Arranged vertically, from top to bottom.

Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 必須和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /> 及 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 列舉值搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: Arranged horizontally, from left to right.

Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 必須和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /> 及 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 列舉值搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: Arranged horizontally, from right to left.

Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 必須和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> 及 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 列舉值搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: Arranged vertically, from bottom to top.

Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 必須和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> 及 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 列舉值搭配使用。
